title: Chicken Arugula Pizza
summary: The recipe Chicken Arugula Pizza could satisfy your Mediterranean craving in roughly 45 minutes. One portion of this dish contains approximately 18g of protein, 7g of fat, and a total of 243 calories. This recipe serves 4. For $1.51 per serving, this recipe covers 8% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. If you have arugula, parmesan, tomato, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the refrigerated pizza dough you could follow this main course with the Grilled Dessert Pizza as a dessert. Many people made this recipe, and 255 would say it hit the spot. It works well as a main course. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 58%. This score is good. Similar recipes include Chicken, Arugula, and Radish Pizza, Chicken, Arugula, and Prosciutto Pizza, and Grilled Chicken, Arugula, Blue Cheese Pizza.

winePairing.pairingText: Italian works really well with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Piccini Chianti Classico with a 4.6 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 10 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Piccini Chianti Classico
productMatches.description: Bright ruby with a hint of purple. Plum, violet notes mix with lush, ripe wild berries. Expansive and alive on the palate, with a lingering, velvety mouth feel. The long finish is buried in fruit.A versatile wine, best served at 64ÂºF, fantastic with juicy red meats, grilled or roasted.

instructions: Preheat the oven to 450F and preheat a rimless baking sheet.Roll out the dough into a 12-inch circle and slide onto the baking sheet. Bake for 7-10 minutes.Remove crust from oven and flip over. Spread the tomato sauce evenly on top. Scatter chicken pieces over sauce and sprinkle with the mozzarella. Return to the oven to bake another 7-10 minutes until cheese is melted and pizza is crispy and brown.Remove pizza from the oven and top with the fresh arugula and a sprinkling of parmesan.Enjoy!

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 450F and preheat a rimless baking sheet.
Roll out the dough into a 12-inch circle and slide onto the baking sheet.
Remove crust from oven and flip over.

Spread the tomato sauce evenly on top. Scatter chicken pieces over sauce and sprinkle with the mozzarella. Return to the oven to bake another 7-10 minutes until cheese is melted and pizza is crispy and brown.
Remove pizza from the oven and top with the fresh arugula and a sprinkling of parmesan.Enjoy!
